sentence: (Tom Williams-Pool/Getty Images / Getty Images) Regarding claims that Ossoff's bill is stronger because it applies to dependent children and also requires offending members of Congress to surrender their congressional salary, Hawley pointed out that his bill would mandate that they disgorge their investments to the U.S. Treasury.
author: Jon Brown
title: Competing bills by Sens. Hawley and Ossoff banning lawmaker stock trading introduced

sentence: Besides Kemp and Perdue, the primary includes Republicans Catherine Davis, Kandiss Taylor and Tom Williams, who were excluded from Sunday's debate.
author: JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Georgia's Kemp and Perdue clash over elections in debate

sentence: Besides Kemp and Perdue, the primary includes Republicans Catherine Davis, Kandiss Taylor and Tom Williams, who were excluded from Sunday's debate.
author: Associated Press
title: Sparks fly in Georgia GOP gubernatorial debate: Perdue adamant 2020 election was stolen
